entry.answer:
As of this (FAQ's) writing, the only characters in the abilities box that exist either in cards in the official game or cards created by Team Bayformers are the following:
Motorcycles (introduced in Wave 1)
Blaster (Blaster vs. Soundwave)
Frenzy (Blaster vs. Soundwave)
Jazz (Wave 1)
Soundblaster (Wave 4)
Soundwave (Wave 3 and Blaster vs. Soundwave)
